content:
I have experience in the field since 2006. I started as an employee of Masaryk University, successively in the positions of GIS specialist, developer, system analyst, and finally head of the GIS group at the Institute of Computer Technology. I spent two years developing the worldwide OpenMapTiles project for MapTiler. Since 2016, I have been working full-time as a freelancer.
More at https://jirikozel.cz/
summary: I have experience in the field since 2006. I started as an employee of Masaryk University, successively in the positions of GIS specialist, developer, system analyst, and finally head of the GIS group at the Institute of Computer Technology.
title: Jiří Kozel

content: I have been working in various positions in the field of digital solutions since 2007. First as a database programmer and later through the roles of Team Leader and Scrum master, I worked my way up to the position of Head of SW Development at Phonexia. I like solving problems and listening to people. Since 2020, I have gone freelance.
summary: I have been working in various positions in the field of digital solutions since 2007. First as a database programmer and later through the roles of Team Leader and Scrum master, I worked my way up to the position of Head of SW Development at Phonexia.
title: Michal Index Král

summary: For group of companies [Czech Center for Science and Society](https://www.ccss.cz/en/), [Lesprojekt služby](https://www.lesprojekt.cz/), and [Wirelessinfo](https://www.wirelessinfo.cz/en/) we create service for publishing geospatial data through REST API.
title: Layman

summary: Under the banner of the company [Altimapo](http://altimapo.cz/) we run grid statistics for professionals and the audience. The BrnoUrbanGrid application covers the city of Brno and the Brno metropolitan area, while the DataMapo application covers the entire Czech Republic.
title: BrnoUrbanGrid and DataMapo

summary: We are working with the [earth.guide](https://www.earth.guide/) team to improve their service on all technological layers from database design to REST API to the mobile application.
title: earth.guide

summary: Together with [RILOG](https://www.vukoz.cz/) and [CzechGlobe](https://www.czechglobe.cz/en/) we present geospatial data to both general and professional public in the form of interactive maps.
title: Geoportals

summary: We have long-term cooperation with Masaryk University, especially with the [Institute of Geography](https://geogr.sci.muni.cz/en) of the Faculty of Science on scientific research projects, for example Modeling the daily dynamics of the number of people present in an urban space (MODUS) or Stress of Citizens and Entropy in Urban Setting (STRECITY).
title: Scientific research projects

summary: We offer consulting in the field of complex web applications, geospatial data processing and interactive maps. We regularly help e.g. [ICS MU](https://www.ics.muni.cz/en) with the system Kompas and the library munimap, and the [Institute of Geonics](https://geonika.cz/index.html) of the Czech Academy of Sciences.
title: Consultancy
